author: Greg Bensinger
title: Uber Agrees Not to Use Waymo Technology in Self-Driving Cars
text:
Uber Technologies Inc. agreed to settle a lawsuit with Alphabet Inc.’s Waymo over claims that Uber stole and inappropriately used trade secrets for self-driving vehicles, ending a year-old legal battle over the future of transportation that had riveted Silicon Valley.
As part of the agreement, Uber promised not to use Waymo technology in its self-driving cars and to ensure no Waymo components were already in use. It also agreed to give Waymo 0.34% of Uber’s equity, which at a valuation of $72 billion for Uber, is equal to...
